mapper.update:
update repository
name = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR},
owner_name = #{owner_name,jdbcType=CHAR},
language = #{language,jdbcType=CHAR},
open_issues_count = #{open_issues_count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
watchers_count = #{watchers_count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
clone_url = #{clone_url,jdbcType=CHAR},
html_url = #{html_url,jdbcType=CHAR},
homepage = #{homepage,jdbcType=CHAR},
created_at = #{created_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pushed_at = #{pushed_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_at = #{updated_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stargazers_count = #{stargazers_count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
forks_count = #{forks_count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
subscribers_count = #{subscribers_count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
languages = #{languages,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
size_score = #{size_score,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
scale_score = #{scale_score,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
promising_score = #{promising_score,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
participation_score = #{participation_score,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
hot_score = #{hot_score,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where full_name = #{full_name,jdbcType=CHAR}

update repository set name = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, owner_name = #{owner_name,jdbcType=CHAR}, language = #{language,jdbcType=CHAR}, open_issues_count = #{open_issues_count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, watchers_count = #{watchers_count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, clone_url = #{clone_url,jdbcType=CHAR}, html_url = #{html_url,jdbcType=CHAR}, homepage = #{homepage,jdbcType=CHAR}, created_at = #{created_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pushed_at = #{pushed_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updated_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stargazers_count = #{stargazers_count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, forks_count = #{forks_count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, subscribers_count = #{subscribers_count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, languages = #{languages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size_score = #{size_score,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, scale_score = #{scale_score,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, promising_score = #{promising_score,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, participation_score = #{participation_score,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, hot_score = #{hot_score,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where full_name = #{full_name,jdbcType=CHAR}

update repository set name = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, owner_name = #{owner_name,jdbcType=CHAR}, language = #{language,jdbcType=CHAR}, open_issues_count = #{open_issues_count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, watchers_count = #{watchers_count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, clone_url = #{clone_url,jdbcType=CHAR}, html_url = #{html_url,jdbcType=CHAR}, homepage = #{homepage,jdbcType=CHAR}, created_at = #{created_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pushed_at = #{pushed_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updated_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stargazers_count = #{stargazers_count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, forks_count = #{forks_count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, subscribers_count = #{subscribers_count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, languages = #{languages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size_score = #{size_score,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, scale_score = #{scale_score,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, promising_score = #{promising_score,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, participation_score = #{participation_score,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, hot_score = #{hot_score,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where full_name = #{full_name,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
select
,
from repository
select full_name from repository

select repository.* from repository,contribute where repository.full_name=contribute.full_name and ((#{0}="" or language =#{0}) and YEAR(created_at) like "%"#{2}"%" and description like "%"#{1}"%") group by repository.full_name order by count(repository.full_name) desc LIMIT #{4},#{3}
select count(*) from repository where (#{0}="" or language =#{0}) and YEAR(created_at)like "%"#{2}"%" and description like "%"#{1}"%"
select language,count(*) as c from repository group by language order by c desc limit 20;
select language,sum(size) as s from repository group by language order by s desc
select YEAR(created_at)as year ,count(*) as c from repository group by year order by year asc
select language from repository where language!="" group by language order by count(*) desc limit 10;
select forks_count from repository force index (primary)
select subscribers_count from repository
select stargazers_count from repository force index (primary)
select DISTINCT YEAR(created_at) from repository order by YEAR(created_at) asc
select YEAR(created_at) from repository force index (primary)
select size from repository force index (primary)
SELECT YEAR(created_at) as year,AVG(size) as size FROM `repository` GROUP BY 1;
SELECT languages from repository;
select size from repository force index (primary) where language= #{language} order by size DESC
select count(full_name) as c from repository
select full_name from repository order by updated_at desc limit 3;
select count(full_name)/(SELECT count(*) FROM repository WHERE LANGUAGE = #{1}) from repository where #{0}>size and #{1}=language
select count(full_name)/(SELECT count(*) FROM repository) from repository where #{0}+#{1}>forks_count+stargazers_count
select count(full_name)/(SELECT count(*) FROM repository) from repository where #{0}*3+#{1}>forks_count*3+open_issues_count
select count(login) from contribute group by full_name
select YEAR(created_at),MONTH(created_at) as time,count(*)as c from repository where YEAR(created_at)!="2007" group by YEAR(created_at),time order by YEAR(created_at) asc
